channel.title: Doug & Wolf
channel.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
channel.description: Doug and Wolf get you up with latest sports news presented in an entertaining way. It's Jock vs. Joe every morning as former NFL player Ron Wolfley brings the perspective of a former athlete and former high school bench warmer Doug Franz speaks for the average fan. Listen live every morning from 6-10 AM Arizona Time on Arizona Sports 620 or download this podcast.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Doug and Wolf get you up with latest sports news presented in an entertaining way. It's Jock vs. Joe every morning as former NFL player Ron Wolfley brings the perspective of a former athlete and former high school bench warmer Doug Franz speaks for the average fan. Listen live every morning from 6-10 AM Arizona Time on Arizona Sports 620 or download this podcast.

Listen live every morning from 6-10 AM Arizona Time on Arizona Sports 620 or download this podcast.

item.title: August 19, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: With Darnell Dockett out for the season, who needs to step up for the Cardinals?
item.description: With Darnell Dockett out for the season, who needs to step up for the Cardinals?

item.title: August 19, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Did any of the quarterbacks impress in Monday Night Football? The Cardinals lost Darnell Dockett for the season. Tyrann Mathieu could be ready to come back soon.
item.description: Did any of the quarterbacks impress in Monday Night Football? The Cardinals lost Darnell Dockett for the season. Tyrann Mathieu could be ready to come back soon.

item.title: August 19, 2014 - Hour: 3
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Doug & Wolf react to news surrounding D-backs' manager Kirk Gibson. We talk to NFL and college football insider Dave Pasch about the loss of Darnell Dockett and Johnny Manziel's Monday Night Football game.
item.description: Doug & Wolf react to news surrounding D-backs' manager Kirk Gibson. We talk to NFL and college football insider Dave Pasch about the loss of Darnell Dockett and Johnny Manziel's Monday Night Football game.

item.title: August 19, 2014 - Hour: 4
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Changes could be coming to the NFL soon and Wolf is not happy about it.
item.description: Changes could be coming to the NFL soon and Wolf is not happy about it.

item.title: August 18, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: The Cardinals offense dazzles again in Minnesota, who has made a name for themselves this preseason?
item.description: The Cardinals offense dazzles again in Minnesota, who has made a name for themselves this preseason?

item.title: August 18, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: We get clarification on the Zach Bauman touchdown and we talk to Cardinals GM Steve Keim.
item.description: We get clarification on the Zach Bauman touchdown and we talk to Cardinals GM Steve Keim.

item.title: August 18, 2014 - Hour: 3
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: What should we be looking for from Johnny Manziel in his Monday night start? Plus, what else did we learn from the second week of the NFL preseason?
item.description: What should we be looking for from Johnny Manziel in his Monday night start? Plus, what else did we learn from the second week of the NFL preseason?

item.title: August 18, 2014 - Hour: 4
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: What did we learn about the Cardinals from their second preseason game?
item.description: What did we learn about the Cardinals from their second preseason game?

item.title: August 15, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Bruce Arians makes his stance on fighting in training camp clear to the Arizona Cardinals. John Abraham shows up to camp.
item.description: Bruce Arians makes his stance on fighting in training camp clear to the Arizona Cardinals. John Abraham shows up to camp.

item.title: August 15, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Doug & Wolf get insider insight into the rest of the NFC West training camps. Johnny Manziel was late to a meeting.
item.description: Doug & Wolf get insider insight into the rest of the NFC West training camps. Johnny Manziel was late to a meeting.

item.title: August 15, 2014 - Hour: 3
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: What trends should we look for in the Cardinals' second preseason game?
item.description: What trends should we look for in the Cardinals' second preseason game?

item.title: August 15, 2014 - Hour: 4
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Doug & Wolf get an update on ASU football from Camp T.
item.description: Doug & Wolf get an update on ASU football from Camp T.

item.title: August 14, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Doug & Wolf discuss the return of John Abraham. They are also joined by NFL Network analyst, Mike Mayock, to discuss how the top quarterbacks practice and when Johnny Manziel will start for the Cleveland Browns.
item.description: Doug & Wolf discuss the return of John Abraham. They are also joined by NFL Network analyst, Mike Mayock, to discuss how the top quarterbacks practice and when Johnny Manziel will start for the Cleveland Browns.

item.title: August 14, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Doug & Wolf discuss ASU football's Edward Sarafin becoming the first active openly gay college football player, whether Carson Palmer is a weapon on offense and whether Larry Fitzgerald will finish his career with the Cardinals.
item.description: Doug & Wolf discuss ASU football's Edward Sarafin becoming the first active openly gay college football player, whether Carson Palmer is a weapon on offense and whether Larry Fitzgerald will finish his career with the Cardinals.

item.title: August 14, 2014 - Hour: 3
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Doug & Wolf discuss ASU football's first day at Camp T and who could be the next MLB commissioner . Patrick Peterson discussed the Cardinals' secondary and which NFC West receiver is the toughest match-up.
item.description: Doug & Wolf discuss ASU football's first day at Camp T and who could be the next MLB commissioner . Patrick Peterson discussed the Cardinals' secondary and which NFC West receiver is the toughest match-up.

item.title: August 14, 2014 - Hour: 4
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Doug & Wolf replay the highlights from today's interviews. Pat Kirwan discussed which rookies in the NFC will have an impact and what he's looking for at Cardinals' camp.
item.description: Doug & Wolf replay the highlights from today's interviews. Pat Kirwan discussed which rookies in the NFC will have an impact and what he's looking for at Cardinals' camp.

item.title: August 13, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Steelers' sideline analyst Craig Wolfley joined us to discuss the Cardinals and the rest of the NFL.
item.description: Steelers' sideline analyst Craig Wolfley joined us to discuss the Cardinals and the rest of the NFL.

item.itunes:summary: Doug & Wolf discuss which rookies are making names for themselves this preseason.

item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Is John Brown's success similar to that of Anquan Boldin's rookie year?
item.description: Is John Brown's success similar to that of Anquan Boldin's rookie year?
